comment: A simple feature as cropping a video turns the saved video into pixelated garbage. I can't believe this hasn't been fixed yet. There has been at least half a dozen updates since I first sent a report about this. I can't be the only one that is getting this problem or nobody gives a shitto fix it. I'll stick with Samsung gallery photo editor it works fine.
key sentence: Crop a video and save it, resulting in the saved video becoming pixelated.

scenarios: Crop a video and save it, resulting in the saved video becoming pixelated.
key sentence: Crop a video and save it, resulting in the saved video becoming pixelated.
the function of activity: The activity involves editing vedioss, playing videos, trimming and muting videos, stabilizing videos, exporting frames, changing tabs, cancelling operations, and saving edited copies.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Crop Vedio', 'description': 'Adjust the boundaries of the Vedio to focus on a specific area'}, {'name': 'Rotate Vedio', 'description': 'Rotate the vedio clockwise or counter-clockwise'}, {'name': 'Adjust Aspect Ratio', 'description': 'Change the aspect ratio of the vedio'}, {'name': 'Reset Crop', 'description': 'Reset the cropping boundaries to their original position'}, {'name': 'Change to Video Tab', 'description': 'Switch to the video editing tab'}, {'name': 'Change to Crop Tab', 'description': 'Switch to the crop editing tab'}, {'name': 'Change to Adjust Tab', 'description': 'Switch to the adjust editing tab'}, {'name': 'Change to Effects Tab', 'description': 'Switch to the effects editing tab'}, {'name': 'Cancel Editing', 'description': 'Discard any changes and exit the editing mode'}, {'name': 'Save Copy', 'description': 'Save the edited vedio as a copy without altering the original'}]
